extensionCommands.name: rubeus
extensionCommands.help: Rubeus is a C# toolset for raw Kerberos interaction and abuses.
extensionCommands.longHelp:
[[.Bold]]Command[[.Normal]]: rubeus [command] [options]
[[.Bold]]About:[[.Normal]] Rubeus is a C# toolset for raw Kerberos interaction and abuses.

Run [[.Bold]]rubeus /help[[.Normal]] to list all examples.

extensionCommands.name: seatbelt
extensionCommands.help: Seatbelt is a C# project that performs a number of security oriented host-survey "safety checks" relevant from both offensive and defensive security perspectives.
extensionCommands.longHelp:
[[.Bold]]Command[[.Normal]]: seatbelt [command] [options]
[[.Bold]]About:[[.Normal]] Seatbelt is a C# project that performs a number of security oriented host-survey "safety checks" relevant from both offensive and defensive security perspectives.

Run [[.Bold]]seatbelt /help[[.Normal]] to list all examples.

extensionCommands.name: sharpwmi
extensionCommands.help: SharpWMI is a C# implementation of various WMI functionality.
extensionCommands.longHelp:
[[.Bold]]Command[[.Normal]]: sharpwmi action=[action] query=[query] computername=[computername] [options]
[[.Bold]]About:[[.Normal]] SharpWMI is a C# implementation of various WMI functionality. This includes local/remote WMI queries, remote WMI process creation through win32_process, and remote execution of arbitrary VBS through WMI event subscriptions. Alternate credentials are also supported for remote methods.
